text.div:
HSPC Body Temperature Measurement Method/Device

SELECT SNOMED CT code system values.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-bodytempmethoddevice defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
30277 Digital Thermometer The electronic thermometer that displays body temperature in numeric values.
30522 Infrared Thermometer The thermometer that measure the temperature by the intensity of infrared light emission.
82735 Thermoluminescent diode thermometer Thermoluminescent diode thermometer is a thermometer that measures the temperature of the emitted heat from the surface of an area.
84301 MRI diffusion thermometer MRI diffusion thermometer is an instrument that uses MRI diffusion to indicate the temperature of a substance.

name: HSPC Body Temperature Measurement Method/Device
description: SELECT SNOMED CT code system values.

concept.definition: The electronic thermometer that displays body temperature in numeric values.
The thermometer that measure the temperature by the intensity of infrared light emission.
Thermoluminescent diode thermometer is a thermometer that measures the temperature of the emitted heat from the surface of an area.
MRI diffusion thermometer is an instrument that uses MRI diffusion to indicate the temperature of a substance.
